extendedInfo.description: This is a DEMO version for DraStic, a fast Nintendo DS emulator for Android. This will let you evaluate the app to see how it works on your device. Save games, save states, and cheats are not supported and there is a time limit of 20 minutes of play. If you would like to purchase the app please see here:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dsemu.drasticDraStic is only intended for play of private backups of legally acquired Nintendo DS games. This product is not affiliated with or endorsed by Nintendo in any way. Do not ask us for ROMs or help getting them - any request will be ignored.NOTE: Android devices using Tegra 2 and Intel x86 are not supported by this emulator. We've attempted to blacklist these devices, but if you still have one that is not blacklisted do not purchase this emulator.

reviews.title: FAST!  Full version is BETTER.
reviews.comment: There are so many options not enabled in the demo, but hey, it\'s a demo.  I was concerned that the \"Circle Button\" on my Xperia Play wouldn\'t map, causing the game to exit.  But this app was so fast, I bought it anyway.  Turns out it\'s not a problem in the full version.  All buttons map correctly!!!  I will give the demo 4 stars, but I\'m giving the full version 5!
reviews.author: Michael Painter

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It\'s really fast and smooth almost like a real DS, but why can\'t I load a game? I save it, go back to open it and  it doesn\'t do nothing except start all over again, I\'m not paying no 8$ and find out I can\'t even save my game to go back and play later
reviews.author: Willie Lucero

reviews.title: Lol its the best there is with the ppsspp combo & ps3 controller
reviews.comment: I just bough the full version a month ago and with the new update runs like 150% better. and i can play with my ps3 controller flawlesslyy this is awesome to the infinite
reviews.author: Fulgore Elite

reviews.title: Great Job
reviews.comment: Add portrait mode and a way to select top or bottom or both screens and ill buy. Otherwise it is the best out there.

reviews.title: Runs really well
reviews.comment: Would have like to give it more stars but couldn\'t try 90% of the stuff like checking out all the screen modes, or resizing of buttons etc.. any plans of maybe ad supported version but with limited features example ad supported versions won\'t have save states but will use the built in game save function,no cheats, couple of screen modes only...
